title: Security and IT Teams No Longer Need To Pay For SaaS-Shadow IT Discovery
description: This past January, a SaaS Security Posture Management (SSPM) company named Wing Security (Wing) made waves with the launch of its free SaaS-Shadow IT discovery solution. Cloud-based companies were invited to gain insight into their employees' SaaS usage through a completely free, self-service product that operates on a "freemium" model. title: New FiXS ATM Malware Targeting Mexican Banks
description:
A new ATM malware strain dubbed FiXS has been observed targeting Mexican banks since the start of February 2023.
"The ATM malware is hidden inside another not-malicious-looking program," Latin American cybersecurity firm Metabase Q said in a report shared with The Hacker News.
Besides requiring interaction via an external keyboard, the Windows-based ATM malware is also vendor-agnostic and is
